description.zh-cn: 中国古代的郡，由汉高祖设置，其名称和治所在不同朝代有所变更。
description.en: An ancient commandery in China, established by Emperor Gaozu of Han, whose name and seat of administration changed over different dynasties.

description.zh-cn: 汉朝的开国皇帝，建立了涿郡。
description.en: The founding emperor of the Han Dynasty, who established Zhuo Commandery.

description.zh-cn: 中国古代的县，曾作为汉代涿郡的治所，为今天河北省涿州市的前身。
description.en: An ancient county in China that served as the seat of Zhuo Commandery during the Han Dynasty and is the predecessor of modern Zhuozhou, Hebei Province.

description.zh-cn: 中国古代朝代。西晋时期，涿郡被改为范阳郡。
description.en: An ancient Chinese dynasty. During the Western Jin period, Zhuo Commandery was renamed Fanyang Commandery.

description.zh-cn: 中国古代的郡，由西晋时期的涿郡改名而来。
description.en: An ancient commandery in China, renamed from Zhuo Commandery during the Western Jin Dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 中国古代的州，其名称与涿郡在历史上曾交替使用于同一地区。
description.en: An ancient province in China, whose name was historically used interchangeably with Zhuo Commandery for the same region.

description.zh-cn: 隋朝的第二位皇帝，曾下令开凿永济渠，并将幽州改名为涿郡。
description.en: The second emperor of the Sui Dynasty, who ordered the construction of the Yongji Canal and changed the name of You Province to Zhuo Commandery.

description.zh-cn: 隋炀帝下令开凿的运河，北端通至涿郡。
description.en: A canal ordered to be built by Emperor Yang of Sui, with its northern end reaching Zhuo Commandery.

description.zh-cn: 中国古代的城市，曾作为隋朝时涿郡的治所。
description.en: An ancient Chinese city that served as the seat of Zhuo Commandery during the Sui Dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 中国古代朝代。唐朝初期，涿郡被复名为幽州。
description.en: An ancient Chinese dynasty. In the early Tang Dynasty, Zhuo Commandery was renamed back to You Province.

description.zh-cn: 汉高祖设置了涿郡。
description.en: Emperor Gaozu of Han established Zhuo Commandery.

description.zh-cn: 汉代涿郡的治所在涿县。
description.en: The administrative seat of Zhuo Commandery during the Han Dynasty was in Zhuo County.

description.zh-cn: 涿县是今天河北省涿州市的前身。
description.en: Zhuo County is the predecessor of modern-day Zhuozhou in Hebei Province.

description.zh-cn: 西晋时期，涿郡被改名为范阳郡。
description.en: During the Western Jin Dynasty, Zhuo Commandery was renamed Fanyang Commandery.

description.zh-cn: 西晋时期，通过将涿郡改名的方式设立了范阳郡。
description.en: During the Western Jin Dynasty, Fanyang Commandery was established by renaming Zhuo Commandery.

description.zh-cn: 西晋时，范阳郡隶属于幽州。
description.en: During the Western Jin Dynasty, Fanyang Commandery was subordinate to You Province.

description.zh-cn: 隋炀帝下令开凿永济渠，其北段通至涿郡。
description.en: Emperor Yang of Sui ordered the construction of the Yongji Canal, whose northern section reached Zhuo Commandery.

description.zh-cn: 隋炀帝将幽州改名为涿郡。
description.en: Emperor Yang of Sui renamed You Province to Zhuo Commandery.

description.zh-cn: 隋炀帝将幽州改名为涿郡。
description.en: Emperor Yang of Sui renamed You Province to Zhuo Commandery.

description.zh-cn: 隋炀帝改幽州为涿郡时，废除了原属幽州的范阳郡等郡。
description.en: When Emperor Yang of Sui changed You Province to Zhuo Commandery, he abolished the commanderies formerly under You Province, including Fanyang Commandery.

description.zh-cn: 隋朝时期，涿郡的治所在蓟城。
description.en: During the Sui Dynasty, the administrative seat of Zhuo Commandery was at Ji City.

description.zh-cn: 唐朝武德初年，将涿郡复名为幽州。
description.en: In the early Wude era of the Tang Dynasty, Zhuo Commandery was renamed back to You Province.

description.zh-cn: 唐朝武德初年，将涿郡复名为幽州。
description.en: In the early Wude era of the Tang Dynasty, Zhuo Commandery was renamed back to You Province.

description.zh-cn: 汉代涿郡的辖境包含今天津市的部分地区。
description.en: The jurisdiction of Zhuo Commandery during the Han Dynasty included parts of modern-day Tianjin.

description.zh-cn: 汉代涿郡的辖境包含今北京市的南部地区。
description.en: The jurisdiction of Zhuo Commandery during the Han Dynasty included the southern part of modern-day Beijing.

description.zh-cn: 汉代涿郡的辖境包含今河北省霸州市。
description.en: The jurisdiction of Zhuo Commandery during the Han Dynasty included modern-day Bazhou, Hebei Province.
